titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for restraining the use of vvine-casks, by brewers, and sellers of beere and ale.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Whitehall, the nineteenth day of November, in the thirteenth yeare of Our reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: England, dlers, 2) there- thing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
